ssd.command: filesystem=$(stat -f -c %T /) && [[ $filesystem == "btrfs" || $filesystem == "ext4" ]] && echo "Filesystem is $filesystem. Proceeding with $filesystem-specific commands..." && ([[ $filesystem == "btrfs" ]] && (btrfs sub create /swaps && chattr +C /swaps) || ([[ $filesystem == "ext4" ]] && mkdir -p /swaps)) && cd /swaps && fallocate -l SELECTEDSWAPSIZEG swapfile.0 && chmod 600 swapfile.0 && ([[ $filesystem == "btrfs" ]] && (mkswap --discard swapfile.0 && swapon --discard swapfile.0) || (mkswap swapfile.0 && swapon swapfile.0)) && echo '/swaps/swapfile.0 none swap sw 0 0' | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab && echo "Commands for $filesystem executed successfully." || echo "This feature is only supported on btrfs and ext4 filesystems."
